title: Suchicodes
landing_about: Welcome! I'm an enthusiastic developer and computer science student passionate about machine learning, low-level programming, and open-source software. As a research assistant, I'm committed to pushing the boundaries of technology.
topic_1_subtitle: Learn about my work, projects, and interests!
topic_2_subtitle: My work from university and notes from classes.
topic_3_subtitle: My notes, projects, and a little about me.
about_section_content:
I'm a Developer - I enjoy building stuff on the web and otherwise :). I am currently pursuing my undergraduate degree in computer science at the Dalhousie University, Canada.

I'm a Full-Stack programmer who also specializes in GUI and CLI (Command-line interface) based application programming for Windows and Linux. I am passionate about computers and servers and intrigued about operating systems and their workings.
work_1_desc: Working with Professor Qiang Ye on building training machine learning models to improve intrusion detection systems (IDS).
work_2_desc:
Worked as a freelance web developer to build a tailored software solution to meet company specific needs. Customized the website UI to enhance investment appeal. Configured a web server to handle requests.

Perform as the system administrator for the company.
work_3_desc:
Worked as a freelance web developer for the Fredericton Legal Advice Clinic (FLAC). Designed and built a web system to handle appointment bookings. Engineered admin pages to allow easy management of appointments.

Perform as the system administrator for the company.
work_4_desc: Completed two co-op work terms (internships) at Introhive as an associate software engineer performing the role of a full stack developer. Engineered solutions to existing stories, fixed multiple gating and top priority bugs and performed rigorous testing of the application.
